Class Player

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.patchwork.Player
public class Player extends Object
Representation of a player
Author:
BERNIER Valentin, VILAYVANH Mickael

    Player(int id)
    Player constructor : Create a new player with an empty quilt board, 0 buttons, a token located at the position 0 and no 7x7 tile

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(int id)
      Player constructor : Create a new player with an empty quilt board, 0 buttons, a token located at the position 0 and no 7x7 tile
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • isAfter

      public boolean isAfter(Player other)
      Returns true if the tokenPosition is greater than the other player's tokenPosition.
      Parameters:
      other - represents the other player.
      Returns:
      true if the tokenPosition is lesser than the other player's tokenPosition.

    • moveTokenTo

      public int moveTokenTo(int position, TimeBoard timeBoard)
      Move the player token to the position on the timeboard. If the player move on a income place or on a special 1x1 patch, the related actions are executed
      Parameters:
      position - int value that represent player destination
      timeBoard - The time board of the game
      Returns:
      Number of special patches to place

    • moveToken

      public int moveToken(int distance, TimeBoard timeBoard)
      Move the player token for a distance on the timeBoard.
      Parameters:
      distance - int value that represent the number of moved cases
      timeBoard - The time board of the game
      Returns:
      Number of special patches to place

    • hasEnoughButtons

      public boolean hasEnoughButtons(int cost)
      Check if the player has enough buttons to pay cost.
      Parameters:
      cost - The cost to check.
      Returns:
      true if the player has enough buttons.

    • payButtons

      public void payButtons(int cost)
      Pay cost buttons
      Parameters:
      cost - A cost less that the player buttons

    • advanceAndReceiveButtons

      public int advanceAndReceiveButtons(Player other, TimeBoard timeBoard)
      Move on the other Player tokenPosition + 1 and receive one button per space moved
      Parameters:
      other - The other player
      timeBoard - The time board of the game
      Returns:
      Number of special patches to place
